violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.

violations.description: Persons are nearby without proper badges.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons have required badges.

violations.description: Unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages nearby.
Fighting, running, or aggressive gestures nearby.
violations.recommendation: Stop any fighting and ensure no one is being aggressive.

violations.description: Not all persons in work zones are wearing required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons in work zones wear required PPE.

report.summary: The scene observation is non-compliant with multiple rules. Please review the recommended actions to ensure safety and compliance.
